defined.description: (test) Checks if a variable is defined (isset())

divisibleby.description: (test) Checks if a value is divisible by other value

empty.description: (test) Checks if a variable is empty

even.description: (test) Checks if a numeric value is even

iterable.description: (test) Checks if a value is iterable. Can be traversed by a ‘for’ statement

odd.description: (test) Checks if a numeric value is odd

sameas.description: (test) Checks if a value is identical to other value

scalar.description: (test) Checks if value is scalar (not an array or object)

type.description: (test) Checks if a value is of the specified type
